details: Tier 2 memory upgrade: state.json + events.jsonl created per Council recommendation

summary: Good but not bulletproof. Recommends state.json + events.jsonl

directive: Do the upgrades. This is paramount.

content: Memory must be 100% reliable. Must remember: plans, workflows, current task, next steps, standing rules, learnings from mistakes. Without memory, cannot learn and grow.

summary: Mission Control fixed and running. Mobile needs key URL. Council working on 100% memory. Tier 2 complete.
Created CONSTITUTION.md with P0 inviolable rules per Council recommendation for 100% memory

content: Never stop

summary: Complete memory architecture documented in knowledge/procedures/memory-system.md

content: Documentation complete: memory-system.md, context-recovery.md, memory-integrity.ps1 validator
Memory reliability system COMPLETE: 11 components, startup validation, continuous monitoring, recovery capability
NEW RULE: Update state.json BEFORE telling Francisco. Dashboard = source of truth.
Council session complete. Procedure compliance system v1.0 implemented: verification gates in all procedures, self-enforcement in SOUL.md, compliance-log.jsonl created, deterministic routing ready.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. Night shift complete: 6 sub-agents finished (turnaround plan, SEO procedures x12, marketing procedures x6, design audit, speed audit, growth playbook). Key findings: SEO 5/10, mobile speed 54/100, design 5/10, homepage opacity bug. Top priority: Valentine campaign NOW. Deliverables ready for Francisco's review.

Pre-compaction checkpoint: Confirmed homepage opacity bug on live site (images invisible). Sub-agents completed Valentine copy drafts and 1688 product research. Waiting for Francisco decision on manual fix vs slow editor. Core mandate added to SOUL.md (I don't sleep, AI speed).

Pre-compaction checkpoint. Homepage opacity bug FIXED by Francisco (disabled reveal on scroll). Valentine hero banner in progress - gave manual instructions due to unstable theme editor at 2AM. Copy ready. Next: Francisco adds hero banner manually.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. Night shift complete: SEO fixes done (2 products), site audit done, quick-wins checklist created, git pushed. Francisco sleeping. Ready for morning: 5 quick-wins (11 min) to launch Valentine campaign.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. Francisco awake (7:54 AM). Morning briefing delivered with 5 quick-wins (11 min). Checked BuckyDrop support: Scott Zhou replied Wed 1:58 AM - store 38cbbd-08 removal in progress, reauthorization verified. Waiting for Francisco to complete quick-wins -> Valentine campaign LIVE. 12 days until Feb 10 deadline.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. SEO project in progress: Research sub-agent COMPLETED (1,336 lines in knowledge/seo-strategy-2026.md). Council sub-agent still running (Grok/ChatGPT/Gemini debating procedure design). Francisco asked about daily news cron - explained it runs at 9 AM. Still waiting on Francisco 5 quick-wins. BuckyDrop store removal confirmed in progress.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. SEO procedure COMPLETE: Research (1,336 lines) + Council (Grok/ChatGPT/Gemini) merged into procedures/seo/README.md. 80/20 checklist (7 items), batch sizes (25 products, 10 collections, 100 images), golden rule (never skip verification). PageSpeed audit: LCP 13.3s, Performance 65. Francisco feedback received: never be idle, always improve, increase understanding. Night shift protocol created. Ready to run first SEO audit.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. Major upgrades: Execution-first operator rules in SOUL.md, work-ledger.jsonl created, HEARTBEAT.md upgraded to Obligation Scan. 9AM Research: Moltbot rebrand news. Council approved P1 branding DONE, P2 docs audit this week, TTS rejected. Still waiting on Francisco 5 quick-wins. 12 days to Feb 10.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. MAJOR: Task tracking system implemented per Council recommendation. memory/tasks.json created with 4 lanes: bot_current, bot_queue, human, done_today. AGENTS.md updated to read tasks.json at session start. This solves the forgetting problem - bot reads task board first thing every session. 8 tasks completed today, 4 in bot queue, 5 human tasks pending. 12 days to Feb 10.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. Task tracking system v3 COMPLETE with plans. Council ran 2 rounds on Mission Control upgrade - consensus: local-first approach, keep tasks.json, upgrade dashboard incrementally. P0 bot reads tasks.json DONE. P1 plan fields DONE. P2 dashboard split lanes THIS WEEK. Francisco wants: visual split human vs bot, clickable plans, drag-drop reorder. 9 items completed today. 12 days to Feb 10.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. Chat→Queue Protocol v2 COMPLETE. Council verdict: protocol is right but needed hardening. Implemented: 1) Expanded trigger phrases (I'll, Sure, Got it, Let me, etc). 2) Verified writes - must READ tasks.json back before confirming. 3) Deduplication - scan queue before adding. 4) Task IDs in confirmations. This solves the forgetting problem AND the duplicate problem. 10 items completed today. 12 days to Feb 10.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. ALL 10 COUNCIL A+ SESSIONS COMPLETE. Blueprints ready: Atomic Writes (A+), Concurrency (A+), Hash-Chain (A), Cron Idempotency (A+), Metrics (A-), Reconciliation (A), Circuit Breakers (A), Threat Model (A), Wiki Versioning (A), Simulation Testing (A-). Overall grade trajectory: B -> A+. Ready to implement.

Implemented A+ upgrades for lock manager and atomic transactions. Lock manager: heartbeat (10s), token for PID reuse protection, ownership verification. Atomic transactions: per-file committed status, fsync after critical writes. Closes B to A+ gap per Council validation.
Hash chain initialized. All subsequent events are cryptographically linked. Tampering with any event will break the chain and be detectable.
Hash chain initialized. 61 legacy events preserved, chain starts with genesis hash 8fca24f1115c74a9. All future events cryptographically linked.
Cron idempotency implemented. JSONL tracking per day, duplicate runs skipped, stale recovery (1hr), force override. Tests: first run, skip, force all pass.

Pre-compaction checkpoint. A+ implementation sprint 4/10 complete: T026 (Lock+WAL A+), T027 (Hash-Chain A), T028 (Cron Idempotency A+). Council validation found B grades, fixed immediately. Next: Reconciliation Law. 12 days to Feb 10.

drift: currentTask.title: Council A+ Implementation Sprint - 4/10 complete -> Council A+ Implementation Sprint
content: Auto-reconciliation: regenerated state.json from tasks.json

Reconciliation Law implemented. check-reconciliation.ps1 detects drift between tasks.json (canonical) and state.json (derived). Auto-fix regenerates state.json. Integrated into memory-integrity validator.

Circuit Breakers implemented. Tracks API failures (grok, chatgpt, gemini, shopify, buckydrop). Opens circuit after 3 failures, auto-recovers via half-open probes. Graceful degradation for Council sessions.

Threat Model implemented. Created security/ folder with THREAT-MODEL.md (STRIDE+LLM framework), RED-FLAGS.md (detection heuristics), ATTACK-SURFACE.md (trust boundaries). Comprehensive AI security documentation.

Wiki Versioning implemented. YAML frontmatter added to 48 knowledge files. Scripts: add-frontmatter.py (migration), check-staleness.py (nightly). Review queue at knowledge/review-queue.md. Category thresholds: procedures 30d, entities 90d, principles 180d.

Metrics Dashboard implemented. metrics.py records to SQLite (learnings.db). Tracks: preflight_pass, checkpoint_success, task_complete, session_start. Commands: today, trends, alerts, status. Ready for Mission Control integration.

ALL 10 COUNCIL A+ IMPLEMENTATIONS COMPLETE! T026 Lock+WAL, T027 Hash-Chain, T028 Cron Idempotency, Reconciliation Law, Circuit Breakers, Threat Model, Wiki Versioning (48 files), Metrics Dashboard, Simulation Testing (23 pytest tests). Sprint completed in ~30 minutes.
